item.title: Mastering the Home Lab: Gitea & Jellyfin on Synology via Cloudflare Tunnel
item.description: Introduction Self-hosting a private Git instance and a high-performance media server on a Synology NAS is the ultimate “power user” move. By leveraging Cloudflare Tunnels, we can expose these services to the internet without opening firewall ports, while keeping our internal traffic secure and locked down. This approach provides enterprise-grade security with zero-trust architecture, all while maintaining the convenience of remote access from anywhere in the world. In this guide, we’ll walk through setting up:
